TopicTitle: [1.10.1] Next Star Industries: BDArmory Weapons Extension has been merged with Next Star Industries.

Articles.Content: I am saddened to say, but i spent multiple hours troubleshooting, but this mods is evil in 1.11.2 and would crash my game in the loading of the game, before even the menu so until its updated there is really nothing I can figure out to do.
so yeah, it seems that NSI in 1.11.2 doesnt play well with other mods, and just does not work, so could you pretty please update the mod?
yeah, the nukes arent producing any sort of effect

I had a bug where the ksp loading bar would freeze at /Internals/cockpitinternal and the bar would get glitchy (pixels going black in the bar). 

I spent a few hours and looked through the ksp.log file and I found that the republic assault ship would slow down everything to appear frozen because it was creating an inventory space for every crew seat (the ship has 500 000 seats)

I then edited the part.cfg file in GameData/NSI/MilitaryDivision/Weapons/Skunk_Works/RAS/Hull and lowered the crew count to 5000. it worked for me and loaded successfully
@Next_Star_Industries any news regards update? been trying to get this mod to work for the past couple of months and i'm overwhelmed by it
for the fighter jet cockpits, the radars aren't working, and the F-18 one can't control the craft
i cant see the explosion after a while how can i fix this

Hello, I installed the mod in the game and must say I absolutely love it. One problem is that when I fire three W88s from my ballistic missile, they always detonate in the air or they detonate at the surface with a wrong angle.  How can I fix that?
